00055 template<class T> struct TypeID {
00056     typedef boost::mpl::plus <
00057     boost::mpl::int_<1>,
00058           typename boost::mpl::distance <
00059           boost::mpl::begin<types>::type,
00060           typename boost::mpl::find<types, T>::type
00061           >::type
00062           > type;
00063     static const unsigned short value = type::value;
00064 };
00065 }

00073     BOOST_MPL_ASSERT_MSG(
00074         ( boost::mpl::contains<_internal::types, T>::value )
00075         , TYPE_IS_NOT_KNOWN
00076         , ( T )
